reviewText: My son loves this and the other Crazy Craft DVDs. We got them at a grocery store. I'll admit we haven't made anything from it yet. But he's watched them enough over and over that we could probably do it without watching the show. It's very inspirational in the context of art and fun.

This is an older television show that we recently discovered. My kids love it. They love the story and it's nice that they break up the story by making the crafts. It is older and the production value isn't the greatest, but it's still fun.
